---
title: rna_multisample
---

Processing unimodal multi-sample RNA transcriptomics data.

## Argument help

Run the following command to view the workflow's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script ./workflows/multiomics/rna_multisample/main.nf --help
```

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name       |Description                     |Attributes                              |
|:----------|:-------------------------------|:---------------------------------------|
|`--id`     |IDs of the sample.              |string, required, example: "foo"        |
|`--input`  |Path to the samples.            |file, required, example: "dataset.h5mu" |
|`--output` |Destination path to the output. |file, required, example: "output.h5mu"  |
:::
